channel.title: Popularity on Simba Tango

item.title: Song numbers
item.author: simbatango@gmail.com (Simba)
item.description: by Stewf Some songs are more popular than others, and some are harder to find than others. Sometimes you have to buy an entire disc full of songs you already have to get just that song. So my library of tango music has a lot of duplicates. And more, is there a word like elevenicates? So the most popular songs are probably available on a lot of records, I figured, and out of curiosity, I checked which were the most popular in my collection, this is for all songs that I have the recording date (from tango.
